segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane

segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane

segment.source: Publishing Servers Results Pane
segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane

segment.source: The Publishing ServersResults pane is one level below the System pane in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console, and it displays a list of the available application publishing servers.
segment.target: The Publishing ServersResults pane is one level below the System pane in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console, and it displays a list of the available application publishing servers.

segment.source: To display specific options for the application publishing servers, right-click any server to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: To display specific options for the application publishing servers, right-click any server to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Refresh Server
segment.target: Refresh Server

segment.source: Refreshes the application and file type associations from the selected application publishing server.
segment.target: Refreshes the application and file type associations from the selected application publishing server.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes the server from the list.
segment.target: Deletes the server from the list.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Refreshes the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Click the General tab, where you can change the server name, select a type from the drop-down list of server types, and specify the host name and port.
segment.target: Click the General tab, where you can change the server name, select a type from the drop-down list of server types, and specify the host name and port.

segment.source: When the server type is Standard HTTP Server or Enhanced Security HTTP Server, the Path field is also editable.
segment.target: When the server type is Standard HTTP Server or Enhanced Security HTTP Server, the Path field is also editable.

segment.source: Click the Refresh tab, where the Refresh publishing on user login check box is selected by default.
segment.target: Click the Refresh tab, where the Refresh publishing on user login check box is selected by default.

segment.source: To change the refresh rate, select the Refresh publishing every check box and enter a number that represents the frequency in the field.
segment.target: To change the refresh rate, select the Refresh publishing every check box and enter a number that represents the frequency in the field.

segment.source: Then select Minutes, Hours, Days from the drop-down menu.
segment.target: Then select Minutes, Hours, Days from the drop-down menu.

segment.source: (The minimum amount of time you can enter is 30 minutes.)
segment.target: (The minimum amount of time you can enter is 30 minutes.)

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the management console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the management console.

segment.source: To display general options for the Result pane, right-click anywhere in the Result pane to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: To display general options for the Result pane, right-click anywhere in the Result pane to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Server
segment.target: New Server

segment.source: On page one of the wizard, enter the name of the server in the Display Name field and select the server type from the Type drop-down list.
segment.target: On page one of the wizard, enter the name of the server in the Display Name field and select the server type from the Type drop-down list.

segment.source: You can choose Application Virtualization Server, Enhanced Security Application Virtualization Server, Standard HTTP Server, or Enhanced Security HTTP Server from the drop-down list of server types.
segment.target: You can choose Application Virtualization Server, Enhanced Security Application Virtualization Server, Standard HTTP Server, or Enhanced Security HTTP Server from the drop-down list of server types.

segment.source: On page two of the wizard, type the appropriate information into the Host Name and Port fields.
segment.target: On page two of the wizard, type the appropriate information into the Host Name and Port fields.

segment.source: The Path field is not editable for Application Virtualization Servers.
segment.target: The Path field is not editable for Application Virtualization Servers.

segment.source: You must enter a path for Standard HTTP Server or Enhanced Security HTTP Server.
segment.target: You must enter a path for Standard HTTP Server or Enhanced Security HTTP Server.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Refreshes the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Can be used to create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Can be used to create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Enables you to change the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Enables you to change the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Arrange/Line Up Icons
segment.target: Arrange/Line Up Icons

segment.source: Can be used to change how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.
segment.target: Can be used to change how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the management console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the management console.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Publishing Servers Node
